website_summaries.verdict: This high-end Apple Watch case delivers a great blend of style and function.
pros: User-friendly design ensures you won't have to remove the case to recharge your Apple Watch
TPU construction delivers immense strength and durability
Comes with a screen protector that will safeguard your screen against scuffs and scratches
cons: Moisture sometimes gets trapped under the case that can affect an Apple Watch's performance

customer_reviews.title: Very protective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instead of just a screen protector, and it works great, my buttons are as easy to press without the case on, it was easy to put on, and I have ran my watch into multiple things at work including the washer and dryer and it has protected my watch and doesn’t even have any scuffs on the protector! The only thing is if your lazy like me and get your watch a little too close to the water when washing your hands some water gets stuck under the case, but it is super easy to take off the case to dry it off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I was too careful to the point where I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about scratching my watch or cracking, even tho I tend to be careful. I felt like I was too careful to the point where I didn’t even want to wear it. I wanted to have a case that was almost invisible and this one was! You can hardly tell I have a case. It’s not bulky or chunky. Very happy and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wish I had gotten it sooner before getting minor scratches on my watch. However, I’m glad that at least this will prevent it from getting any more. Was easy to install. Just have to be careful not to get water between the screen and the protector, otherwise it’ll fog up or have a water film in between. I forgot to take the watch off while washing hands and that’s what I observed. But what else was to be expected? :) The material is sturdy and not flimsy or cheap. Worth the bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Sahar F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. I was looking for something simple and easy to use that would protect my Apple Watch & both the screen protector and bumper are exactly as described. The bumper may take a little longer installing but other than that, it works great! You can use the screen protector alone or with the bumper.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Braden

customer_reviews.title: So far I am really liking this product. It ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really liking this product. It came with 2 protectors. One was the bumper cover only (did not cover the screen) and the other was a wrap around that also covers the screen. I am using the wrap around at the moment and so far I am loving it! It does not affect the touch screen on the watch and all the precut holes for the buttons lines down band up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Xen

customer_reviews.title: Fits well with a slim look!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and now I feel more relieved with this case on! I didn’t have a case for my first Apple Watch and got a crack on my screen. This time I did not want to even wear my watch until I got a case for it. I love that they have the option of an all around case with the screen covered and an option with the screen not covered. Such a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: VIVIAN H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome, I love it so much because you can barely tell I have one on and it’s not bulky at all. Was a pain to put on but something that isn’t a point to notice when deciding to purchase. Some reviews I read said that it didn’t come with 2 pieces but mine did. One (in photo) that covers the whole screen and sides of watch and the other was one you would use if you had a screen protector on your watch. Such a great product for such little price!
customer_reviews.author: Audrianna Lampkin

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️🌟
customer_reviews.text: Great case and screen protector. Just be aware you can’t use these together. It’s one of the either. However, they both do there job.
customer_reviews.author: Maricella DeLisle

customer_reviews.title: questionable quality control
customer_reviews.text: 02/21/20 update I got these for my dad’s new Apple Watch and one of the screen protectors was scuffed up and dirty right out of the box. I can’t return because I really need the other one. So disappointed. This most recent order also didn’t have the same packaging as the two others I’ve bought in the past. Not sure what’s happening. OMG. I’ve had to deal with little screen protectors that begin to lift and peel off, and poorly made bumpers. I’m so glad I bought this. The entire watch is protected, so I don’t have to worry about accidentally bumping my wrist on anything and scuffing my watch.
customer_reviews.author: NorEsBo

customer_reviews.title: Apple watch protector is great
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even realize that watch cases were a thing until my friend told me about it. I was hesitant as to the functionality of the touch screen with the case on. But there's no impact to the touch screen atleast with this case. There's 2 cases in the package so i'll have a good replacement if and when the first one wears out. I've banged my watch a few times already before I got the case so I'm really excited that now my Apple watch will be protected against my clumsy actions. Also since this is a clear case, it blends it completely with the watch and provides great protection against damage to my apple watch.
customer_reviews.author: VD

customer_reviews.title: This leaves a "suction" mark on the watch face
customer_reviews.text: This is a rubbery cover for your watch. It did appear to have the proper cutouts, etc. and my watch seemed to respond fine, but what I didn't like was that once installed, it has "suction marks" beneath it that make the watch face look ugly. Think of a reverse bubble on screen protector. It's also tricky to get on the watch and once I read that you should remove the cover when swimming, and I saw what a pain it was to get off, I decided to return this. Good idea in theory, but I'm not willing to have an ugly watch face to look at and need to remove it every time I swim--it's summer for goodness sake!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Fracc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item in the mail and while I can't attest to its duribility, I am very happy with it. I have disliked other cases that I have purchased and returned because of how they affect the touch screen. This does NOT have a screen but is just the bumper, which is perfect. I have already scratched my watch face twice since getting it 3 months ago, all in the same area - the upper left and right corners where I smack them into things. This bumper will definitely stop more scratches from accumulating. While the perfect scenario in my opinion is no bumper, this will do and I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Ann Forsgren

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Great for impact protection. Installation is a bit of a pain but not too too bad. Just not the best. Bands must be removed from the watch. The only real issues is the scratches that are easily obtained on the surface. The touch screen is finicky. When you sweat or Get it wet, all use is out the window. You have to disassemble the whole watch to dry the case so it’s usable again. Again, for general office use, it’s Great. But for the active Individual I wouldn’t recommend it. This seller is very responsive and helpful!! Great people to work with if you have any concerns or issues.
customer_reviews.author: A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Holds moisture.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this in the mail today, put it on before my workout. Moisture immediately got stuck under the screen and my watch would no longer work until I took the case off and dried it! So if you workout this is not the case for you. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Protects the screen but not great in the water
customer_reviews.text: It’s hardly noticeable and it does the main job which is to protect the screen. However, I’m not 100% happy with it... it’s not that easy to put and remove from the watch, which is not an issue if you’re going to leave it on all the time. However, because I go to swim every week and the touch doesn’t really work very well in the water because of the water that gets in between the case and the screen, I have to always remove it when I go swimming, which is a bit annoying...
customer_reviews.author: Francisca

customer_reviews.title: Great protector.  Definitely a must have for your watch.
customer_reviews.text: Before this, I bought a screen protector and even though it protects my screen, I started to notice hat the side of my watch are getting a lot of scratches so I decided to give this a try. Even with the case, I have no problem pressing the button. The only thing is to make sure not to watch your hand with it as the water might get between the watch and the screen. If that happens, just dry it thoroughly before you put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Paulinemui

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't that hard to install but I'm a person who likes to swim & hike with my watch so it does get a bit annoying having to take the cover off and put it back on every other day. The cover does get scratched and I have not been able to wipe away most of the scratches, but better the cover than the watch! I have also noticed that sometimes it is difficult to pull down the notifications on my watch with the cover on. But the cover does protect my watch and that's why I purchased it and so far it's my favorite cover that I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: ycybarra

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Apple Watch bumper case that will add safety to your watch. The case is snug around the Apple Watch and I could use the buttons without any issues. You will receive two bumpers, but I think each one will last you a few years when you take care of it. While it is not pictured, I tried multiple bands and there was no issues - easy to add and remove bands. Overall, great addition for someone that may bump into walls occasional!
customer_reviews.author: Maikel M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through a couple screen protector for my watch I had a series 2 but finally one day I dropped it on my marble floor and the screen busted. So I got a new watch and I wasn't gonna make the mistake of not protecting it again. The full case is so clear and can hardly tell its on. I am worried about the sweat getting in when I work out and just around town as I live in Singapore but since it comes with a bumper case too I guess I can change it out if it bothers me. Its super flexible as well, look forward to having this case.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Needed to get these when I upgraded my phone and could no longer use USB-B cables. When buying low cost electronic supplies, I always worry that they will be cheap quality. To my surprise these are very well made. The length is perfect. And the braiding keeps them from getting tangled and gives them a nicer look and feel than a standard cable. I keep one on my night stand, one in my car, and another one at work. The adapter is also nice because I can use it with my portable charger. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coberly

customer_reviews.title: Removed after about a week.
customer_reviews.text: When I first put the protector on it covered the entire watch and I was happy with that. I work in the service industry and my watch can take some abuse. When I first used it everything was great and then after I got into the sunlight you could see where the rubber wasn't touching the screen and in certain light it was hard to see the screen. The swiping gestures on the watch were made more difficult. The extreme left and right would lose contact with the screen. Basically this case would be great for a day out where you know you needed to protect it. It is not an everyday case for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ben J

customer_reviews.title: Easy of fitting
customer_reviews.text: Love this product such versatile and so authentic love it. This is a flexible plastic protector that wraps around the watch so it protects more than the screen. I tried a few different screen protectors before buying this and wasn't happy with them. Since the screen is smaller than a smart phone but the materials are basically the same, they don't adhere well or last. The case also doesn't interfere with the operation of the watch. They also send you two cases so you have an extra for back-up or future use.
customer_reviews.author: Anu G.

customer_reviews.title: One of the 2 protectors works great.
customer_reviews.text: Glad this set came with 2 different ones because the one that covers the whole face is not the greatest when it comes to touch screen because it is so thick so I am using the one that only wraps around the edges adding a bumper to it! The quality is good but at times the one that covered the whole face did not function as it should and made it hard to use the touch screen I ended up keeping the set cause it was inexpensive and I was able to use at least one of them
customer_reviews.author: Rahani

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty watch case
customer_reviews.text: After breaking my first apple watch, I realize that apple watch also need a protective case just like my phone. I bought this for my 44mm apple watch. This case is very good quality and comes in two way protection. You can either use the front to protect the screen and the sides or you can use just the bumper and leave your screen open. Watch has to be protected from the sides and this case does it very well. Its thin but protects the watch nicely. Great product and highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mah

customer_reviews.title: Both protectors are not the same
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed to swap my protector with the second one since my first one was turning black after a few months to find the other protector was only a bumper and didn’t cover the screen. That’s on me because I didn’t clearly read the description but just be aware. Also if you do a workout with it your sweat will get in and under the screen making it impossible to use until you remove the case to dry the sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Summer

customer_reviews.title: They'll last until USB becomes obsolete. High quality and very low price.
customer_reviews.text: $3 for each of these are a steal. The cables that came with the Note 8 charger are absolute trash. When you connect it to a PC to copy files, sometimes it will cut off or not even connect at all. These $3 ($9 for a 3 pack) cables work perfectly for data transfer and fast charging. The braiding is thick and the type c connector bis a solid piece. These are well made. The connector housing appear to be aluminum. If these were sold at a phone store or Best buy, they would charge you $15 to $20 each for them. $9 for 3 is a monster deal.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Protective... but at what cost?
customer_reviews.text: I do feel like the case was sturdy on my phone, but unfortunately regular exercise and bathing trapped water in between the screen and the case, so I ended up having to remove the case 1-2x per day to clean it, otherwise the touchscreen was rendered unusable. Maybe if you don't plan on exercising, and you take off your watch during a shower, it might be fine? But to me, it was more of a headache than it was worth.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Claire

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: it’s super easy for water to get under this and make the touchscreen unusable—it happens just about every time I wash my hands with my watch on. the plastic is also starting to yellow very quickly (within a few months of purchase). I suppose I’m a bit harder on it than average because I work in food service, so maybe this just isn’t intended for that kind of wear and tear, but it’s disappointing nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan David

customer_reviews.title: Nice but flawed
customer_reviews.text: Loved this in the beginning but noticed it started to look a little dingy over time, like a month or so. I have a white band and it is still clean and nice so this cover just seems to collect dust or dinginess easily. Also, started to lose touch screen capabilities. It does keep your screen watch safe from scuffs and scratches as advertised though.
customer_reviews.author: misty mccrary

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job it’s made for which is protecting my Apple Watch from dings, scrapes, and shattering. It does change the sensitivity of your touchscreen so you will need to get used to pressing a little harder when texting but otherwise everything works the same. It’s not waterproof so if you get any water under the cover remove the cover and dry your watch ASAP (which the manufacturer tells you in the the enclosed information booklet). I’m super clumsy and this helps me out a lot for a wry good price!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Pacino

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on my watch. I like the look of it. I am always banging my wrist on something, this cover has already come in handy in protecting my watch. Only complaint is sometimes when I have to key in my passcode I may have to press a little harder. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Binktam

customer_reviews.title: Total Protection!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a protector for my apple watch because I was afraid of a scratch or bump, now I am quiet because it is very protected. The case is ultra slim so it doesn't detract from my beautiful watch. It was easy to install, very good material and resistant. However, you must be careful not to wash your hands so that they do not get fogged by moisture. It does not affect the touch screen on the watch and all the precut holes for the buttons lines down band up perfectly...
customer_reviews.author: BrachoPrimeraA

customer_reviews.title: Apple Watch Case
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent case for my Apple Watch! And I didn’t even realize it was a 2-pack, so I have an extra! It looks very sleek and protects the entire watch very well. I had a screen protector, which was more like a sticker, on it for about 2 weeks before I got this case, and I like this so much better. I ditched the screen protector! I tend to swing my arms as I walk and often bump my wrist/hand into walls and corners; this case protects my watch from scuffs and screen cracks (which is what happened to my previous Fitbit). Easy to install. I would absolutely purchase again and highly recommend for any Apple Watch user.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Diver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this September of 2018 and I’m just now having to replace it. It definitely did the job and you have to take it off if you plan on wearing it when taking a shower or swimming to clean underneath the bumper (hard to use the touch screen when there’s water under the case). I was very pleased...except it does start to turn black around the edges and makes it harder to see the screen after a while. I’m going to be buying another one. I never used the edge one I used the full coverage one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Really protects from bumps and hits
customer_reviews.text: If you work with your hands and offen bump your Apple watch, this would be a good protector for your watch. The only down side is if you get it wet. Washing hands shouldn’t be an issue but if you really get it wet, water does get inside the case. I usually take a QTip and clean it with out removing it. The case also protects all corners of the watch. Another good factor is that It’s clear so you can’t really notice it’s protected. Now.... let’s see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Just Lou

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: This item does make the touch screen a little more difficult to use but once you get used to it, it didn’t bother me anymore. Water can get inside so be careful when you are near water. Easy to place over the watch. Very sturdy, I’ve used it for several months and still good and the same clear colored. Others I have used get worn and dingy looking. This one still looks new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get a case for my Apple Watch after a close call where I almost cracked the screen. This case goes around the entire face/corners so I’m confident it will provide added protection. Any case adds a bit of difficulty with touch screen sensitivity but still completely functional.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ubaldi

customer_reviews.title: Protects great, easily gets water inside
customer_reviews.text: Protects great but! Every time you wash your hands water gets inside and then the touch screen does not work so you have to take the band off completely dry it and put it back in again! With Covid and how much we wash our hands it’s hard to not get wet. You have to be really careful.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Prevent Scuffs and Scratches on Your Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: This Apple Watch case is easy to install and comes with wipes to help clean your watch first. A good clear plastic is able to protect your watch from all bumps and prevents annoying scratches. The touch screen is responsive. Definitely get one of these cases if you want to protect your investment and have better resale value in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It is what I need. 👍
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Didn’t know could be so easy to protect your Apple Watch. I’m not use to use watch and I find myself touching it often to different arias so I wanted some protection from scratches, other than apple care for when is already broken. You can’t tell that is covered. Doesn’t change any aspect and the protection is very sensitive, you can use the touch screen as normal.
customer_reviews.author: Popsa Dana

customer_reviews.title: But with this I can be my clumsy self and still have a nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: My last watch I had the sticky protector that lasted maybe a week, I didn't notice it fall off and then there was a giant scratch in the middle... But with this I can be my clumsy self and still have a nice looking watch. I was scared about the bulky-ness but got it for the price! it hasn't touched water yet but Ive worn it with the full front protector and its held up nicely! haven't tried the bumper yet.
customer_reviews.author: Katanne

customer_reviews.title: And then there were two...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to travel with me in case I forgot my charger at home. A few days ago one of these stopped charging my phone. I kept getting an alert on my phone saying it wasn't charging. I, thankfully, managed to have my cord with me and had to use it. I haven't tested the other two cords to know if they need switched ever so often or if this single cord just quit. Overall, great quality and set with a bag and band to bunch up the cord (attached to each cord).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I got this for my new Apple Watch. It’s very light and doesn’t add any weight to the watch. But you can tell by the thicker silicone and it’s going to protect the entire watch. You need to takeoff the band to put it on and it’s a nice tight fit. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This screen cover works well for protection, is fairly easy to install and remove, and the touch screen responds well, but the silicon material sticks and clings in places to the watch screen snd is distracting to me. I have ordered a different hard protective screen protector and plan to return this screen cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for Apple watch!
customer_reviews.text: With precision cutouts, this watch case fits perfectly for my Apple Watch Series 5. I was very pleased to see the excellent quality along with owner's manual and wet/dry wipes. Very easy to install/remove. I am excited to wear my Apple watch even more now knowing that it's safely secured and still have access to touch screen. Thank you for this great product and will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great buy was expecting to be hard plastic and bulky but to my surprise it’s a soft plastic and you can’t even tell it’s on their and touch screen works well no issues worth the money and comes in a pack of two good deal if you have anyone else who needs one
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: Great protectors
customer_reviews.text: Comes with 2 different ones! One that’s more of a bumper and leaves the screen open. And the other surrounding the whole watch. Glad to know I have a backup. I’m using the one that surrounds the whole watch right now and it was a little difficult to get on but not too bad. The touch screen works fine with it on and there’s no bubbles or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Picard

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this comes with two different bumper styles. I haven’t used the normal bumper yet, only the full screen protector version. It is slightly difficult to get onto my watch, but once it’s on, I feel like it’s doing a pretty good job at protecting it from all the bumps and scrapes that will inevitably happen. It does make the watch a tiny bit harder to operate, but nothing crazy, you just have to push down a bit harder on it. I like that you can’t really tell that you have a bumper on, and it still shows off the color of my watch. I’d definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SavAndMal

customer_reviews.title: It's a case for your watch!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much to say for this since it's just a case but what I can say is that, it was well packaged, it's durable! It's also cheap and I'd definitely get it to protect my investments!
customer_reviews.author: Amaborn

customer_reviews.title: decreased touch sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I just received this cover for my brand new Apple Watch and so far, I am impressed. It fit perfectly and it was easy to install. I used the all-around clear cover for my watch and not the bumper. There are little microdots on this cover, so it is not completely clear. The reason for the 4 stars is that the touch sensitivity decreases so much that I have to press down hard to scribble for texts.
customer_reviews.author: tnguyen

customer_reviews.title: Sent straight to the junk drawer
customer_reviews.text: These look nice but are utter garbage. 2 out of 3 don't work at all and the one that does takes forever. I am eagerly awaiting the day when aftermarket power accessories are good because I have yet to find any that do (for any device) and have probably spent cumulatively more on trash cables than I would've on the pricey branded ones.
customer_reviews.author: pgvillage

customer_reviews.title: Great First Impression
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like the case. It is sturdy and seems like it will really protect the watch. The buttons are easy to access and the screen is still very responsive with the cover on. The downside would be that moisture can collect under the case and makes the screen less responsive, but you can remove and dry and it will work fine. I'm happy with the case and the protection it offers for the price.
customer_reviews.author: metro

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Apple WATCH 3
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of this is great, thin and stylish. It was a little hard to get on but overall it is easy enough. The top however was really hard to get on while keeping your fingerprints off the watch face. It is a little hard to see in bright light because it has little grids in it. I would buy it again but only for the bottom piece, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: BootsyM

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, unnoticeable
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact I received 2 in the package. Such a great buy, i have had these for months now and I am still on the first one. It provides great protection to my watch screen, but it is NOT at all bulky. You don’t even notice it is on my watch, I don’t like the bulky ones that you can see the screen protector. This one is perfect and sleek. Nobody even knows I have one over my screen. So it goes with all my Apple Watch bands.
customer_reviews.author: Graham08

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Apple Watch Safe with these Cases!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are some fantastic cases to keep your Apple watch safe! The pack comes with two cases and even comes with two sets of wipes to make sure the watch is clean before the case is installed. I've seen some pretty crummy Apple Watch cases in the past, but these AREN'T one of them! These cases are durable and fit snug with my watch. I can't wait to wear it in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Payton McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: It’s great, little to no problem
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It does everything it’s supposed to and I haven’t had any issues. I didn’t even realize that there were actually two separate cases but with different designs which was nice. The only problem is putting it on is a bit difficult but isn’t a major obstacle. And while it can get wet it sometimes gets water under it which is very annoying. But other than that, it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Screen protector and case!
customer_reviews.text: I normally purchase a screen protector and case separately so this case is convenient since it incorporates both! I like that it’s clear also so I don’t have to worry about matching it to a specific watch band. It also came with two cases!! So if one get scratched or worn out I’ll have a back up! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lee ling

customer_reviews.title: Makes your wrist sweaty
customer_reviews.text: I was not a fan of the screen protector. This protector covers the whole watch, even the back part. One of the protectors creates condensation on the screen and it makes it difficult for you to use the touch screen. After a few minutes of using it, I felt my wrist get sweaty. It also makes your watch look bulky, even though the screen protector is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Susana E

customer_reviews.title: Responsive and Durable
customer_reviews.text: When I got my watch I started buying the bands and the protective covers for it because I’m slightly clumsy and was worried about smacking it on something This is by far my favorite cover. It’s responsive and it is durable. I love it. I give it an 5 star review and I’ve put it back in my cart so I can have the same exact one-off replacements.
customer_reviews.author: wendy s.

customer_reviews.title: Ruined the first day
customer_reviews.text: I promptly put this on my watch, and then sprayed mosquito repellent to go to the river. The case immediately got get tacky and permanently has hundreds of little divots. However, my watch screen is fine so I guess it did its job. Just don't use it around bug spray! Its not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: MeganMae

customer_reviews.title: I don't even remember purchasing this...
customer_reviews.text: I don't remember purchasing this but these are good products...hopefully whoever stole my identity really enjoyed protecting their watch. We don't even use apple products...oh well.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM J. CANTU

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This case is fit perfectly for the 44mm, just a little bit hard to get it out. It is soft silicone and the touch screen are very good. I have been use it for couple weeks and doesn’t see any issue with the touch screen options.
customer_reviews.author: Sekwim

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t snug the watch
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to fit snug, but felt disappointed that it didn't snug the watch. Water went inside and made the watch screen very difficult to function, instead I had to remove the case.
customer_reviews.author: Family Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like this overall. It’s protecting my watch very well with the screen cover and side covers. Only thing I don’t love is that it is somewhat difficult to engage the touch screen without a bit of effort. But with practice it stops being so annoying.
customer_reviews.author: lynn b

customer_reviews.title: The cables have worked great so far
customer_reviews.text: The cables have worked great so far. The boots on the ends are both flexible and protective of the cable at the termination. The cord is fairly flexible - more so actually than I would have expected, but they are still OK. The included adapter is a micro USB to USB-C adapter. THIS is a handy item, and I wish the package came with more of these! I was able to easily convert my high-wattage fast car charger to a USB-C connection. Absolutely worth it if you have some existing fast chargers in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T

customer_reviews.title: Case
customer_reviews.text: I received 2 cases. There is one that covers all including the face of the watch and another that covers just around the face and edges. I prefer the case that covers the edges only. I really like how it fits my watch. I've had the case for a few months now and have had no issues. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This cover was extremely simple to install and I have no problems with the touch screen with the cover installed! I am still able to easily access all of my applications and everything!
customer_reviews.author: avena_

customer_reviews.title: An essential for your iwatch series 4 and 5
customer_reviews.text: I like how this clear cover is securely attached on to the iwatch offering complete protection of the top and edges keeping your watch fresh. The covers I used before would pop right off if I accidentally brush it on something. I was surprise to receive two pcs when I expected one.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: A pain in the butt to put on
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive this all around case for the apple watch, even purchase one for my girlfriends since I just got her an apple watch. However I read the directions to put the case on, it took me forever. I really shouldn't have been as hard as it was to put on the watch, but it was. After I finally got it on, I had to adjust and it literally was impossible. Also yes, I did make sure it was the right size before trying to put it on. I think the product is good but maybe it just needs to be way easier to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen was great and protection was amazing. However, when working out sweat would get under the cover so I was constantly removing watch bad and drying my watch. Not super convenient. Just ok if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great Protector
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having to replace my cracked screen protectors all the time. I'm excited to use this one! It was easy to put on, and the touch ability is still super accurate. My wife has one similar and has yet to damage it. I feel this one will be just as durable!
customer_reviews.author: Mike_A

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok if you aren’t in the sun, or swim
customer_reviews.text: Got it and immediately put it on my series 4. At first I liked it. Then I noticed it starting to yellow fairly quick after working out in the sun for weeks. If I went swimming the touch would completely stop until I took it off and dried it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: sad face 8(
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this item but it was a little disappoining. The cover that goes over the watch is a little too thick I guess because it didn't sensed the touch of my fingers. Thank God it came with other under cover, that surprised me because I wasn't expecting that one, and that one does cover really well. But, again, I would of prefer the one that goes over the watch.
customer_reviews.author: After Anna todd

customer_reviews.title: Great worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. People are genuinely surprised when they find out there is a protective cover on my watch. It’s very hard to see. It hasn’t discoloured and the touch screen sensitivity has not diminished. Dirt and dust do not accumulate under the protector. My watch face has been saved a number of times. Cannot recommended this product highly enough. Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great cables! I ordered 2 sets
customer_reviews.text: Great cables! I ordered 2 sets. I was pleasantly surprised when I received the cables, the packaging was great. They come inside a nice pouch, which comes in handy not only to carry an extra cable with me, but for my portable charger as well. I love the feel of the braided cable. They look and feel sturdy; definitely nicer than other cables on the market. I like that they come in black, I have seen other cables in other colors as well, but prefer the black. The micro to USB C adapter is an nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: MrsVega919

customer_reviews.title: Great watch protector
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty great. I always used screen protectors on my watch to keep it from scratching but the corners come off. This comes with one full screen and a bumper case. They are a little difficult to put on but they work really great. No complaints here
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Gilley

customer_reviews.title: Only one
customer_reviews.text: I love the item but it shows a 2 pack, I only received one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahapel

customer_reviews.title: Protective case
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a protective case. It’s not like other cases that have a screen protector included. Which I really like because sometimes the screen protector makes it difficult to use the watch. It’s a strong plastic cover so doesn’t brake easily.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Better for daily use and tough screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Simple screen protector, protects both the screen and surrounding metal. Good transparent look. Protects your Apple Watch from damage in your busy living livestyle. It’s not bulky and big. It covers the entire screen and the sides of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: sharath R

customer_reviews.title: Watch saver
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have gotten this soon enough. My daughter dropped my watch and no scratches no nothing. I am still able to swipe my finger across the screen to text it doesn't make it hard for me. With it being clear it's cute with all of my bands.
customer_reviews.author: Donnesha brown

customer_reviews.title: Super clear and slim
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice super clear screen protector (Attached a photo comparing it to the old one I've). this is a pack of 2 screen protectors, so it is excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Sherif Abou Seda

customer_reviews.title: Best on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! I don’t have total mobility coverage offered by my carrier so I feel safe with this on my Apple Watch. My item was shipped right away and the seller is very professional and easily accessible! Will be referring this product to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item a 4 overall rating because I love the protection it gives my apple watch, but what I don't like about it is how hard it is to get on and off and water gets trapped under it. Whenever I'm doing the dishes or washing my hands and I get water on my watch, it stays there. I have to take the whole wrist band off, then the screen protector and then wipe out the water. I would buy it again because of the protection it gives my screen overall, but just fair warning about water issue.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great way to protect your watch!
customer_reviews.text: The application is easy as it is made of TPU but it is pretty durable to protect my Apple Watch 3 from unexpected scratches. You can't beat the price either and i believe it's on clearance because Apple Watch 4 just came out. Regardless, you won't find a better one at this price.
customer_reviews.author: skygamer

customer_reviews.title: Adapter doesn't work. Have to remove most phone cases to use the charging cables.
customer_reviews.text: These are alright, they work, I do have to take my case off my phone to use them which is super annoying. With the cable that came with my Samsung note 8, that was never an issue. Also the adapter for older android USB cables to USB-C doesn't work... so that sucks. I was hoping to use that with my car charger, but it looks like I'll have to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch cover
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and easy to use. Water/moisture do get stuck in the full case and it becomes hard to navigate the watch but it’s easy to rake out and dry out. The bumper is also easy to use and did not get moisture while working close to a water or when working out.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Very useful. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My husband just bought me this Apple Watch for our anniversary. I find it a beautiful piece of tech. knowing that I wear my watch on the underside of my wrist, I knew the face would be scratched up over time. This cover is perfect to prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: Eggcellent

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for my watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cover I will use for my watch. It is larger than others but still really thin. It protects the body of the watch which is exactly what I wanted. Would purchase again. Super durable and protects my watch.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great protective case
customer_reviews.text: These cases were great! They fit just right and my watch feels protected. It came with one case that covered the entire watch, and another that was just a bumper case. I like being able to see the actual watch, so these clear cases are a good option!
customer_reviews.author: Ty Newman

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: I really like it.. Not really hard to put on and screen touch reacts well so far. I will take it off once every 2 weeks to clean it.. I don't swim in my watch yet and don't get it wet so not sure about that.. But overall very happy with it..
customer_reviews.author: Kuroth

customer_reviews.title: Great, true to size!
customer_reviews.text: Great screen protector! I'm still able to touch my screen with ease. I'm glad got it because my friend dropped her apple watch in the floor and it cracked into pieces. So I knew I had to get a screen protector ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I feel like I bang my watch into door frames and stuff all the time. I use the one without the screen cover and it works great for protecting the corners of my watch. My sister uses the one with the screen cover and she likes it, but it scuffs when she hits it on things. Better the protector than the watch!
customer_reviews.author: Bum

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great quality. It's crystal clear and fits perfectly. You can access all the buttons easily and the touchscreen works well. Also, it has a really nice, soft feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S.

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen not working
customer_reviews.text: It seems I am the only one having an issue with the touch screen working correctly with the full screen protector on. With the screen on none of my apps will open when I touch them. The touch screen just isn’t working correctly with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cologne

customer_reviews.title: Traps Moisture making the Touch Screen Useless
customer_reviews.text: purchased this to protect my watch from damage during workouts. However the solid cover traps moisture from your body heat under the cover and then the touch screen no longer works. Useless!
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Ryan

customer_reviews.title: There's actually two cases included in this package
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on Apple watch protectors and landed on the LELONG clear screen case for my 44mm gen 4. It's perfect! I don't normally write many reviews but the fit and finish on the case are exactly what I was hoping for. I was afraid it might be too bulky, but to be honest I don't even notice it's there anymore. And yes, my headline is accurate. There's both an open face and a closed face version. They're both excellent and right now I'm using the open faced version. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D Olmstead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Screen Protector for Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent screen protector, high quality, the image of the screen is not distorted, which indicates good material of manufacture of the product. It's easy to install without having to deal with the cumbersome bubbles that form with regular screen protectors. Completely protect the apple watch case. I am definitely very happy with my purchase selection.
customer_reviews.author: Yawhara El Khatib

customer_reviews.title: Great simple protection for your watch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price for 2 (!) cases. The case itself is pretty clear, easy to install on your watch and protects your device just fine. Now I do not worry to ran into something. Use it on a daily basis and would keep the second case as a gift. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vasilii Fet

customer_reviews.title: Protects but hard to tap screen
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a hard case, but it isn’t. It’s a flexible material. When wearing sunglasses it looks weird. I have to tap the screen 2-4x to click on things. It gets dirty and wet under it easily. But on the bright side it DOES protect my screen which is really what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea D

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this case is good. The material is very flexible and not rigid like I assumed. It is easy to install also, however I cannot seem to get the air bubble out from under the screen. The profile of the case is very slim and not noticeable by the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth roseman

product_meta.title: LELONG Case for Apple Watch Series 5 4 3 2 Screen Protector 38mm 42mm 40mm 44mm, Soft TPU All-Around Clear Protective Cover for iWatch Series 5 Series 4 Series 3 Series 2
feature_bullets: Multiple protection:It protects the screen and four sides stands a little, Scratch-proof, anti-collision. NO Gap, Bubble-Free.

Special Design: Precise cutouts fit for all buttons and holes on your watch, do not affected the band insertion or watch charging as well. Small dot on the screen protector is designed to prevent water marks, also barely notice expect under the sunlight.

Warm-Tips: Wearing the full screen protector at gym or sports activities will cause moisture under the screen protector, also impact touch sensibility. So before doing sports activities, please take it off before, and DO NOT use the film screen protector and full coverage together.
Full Protection with Screen Protector: Soft High clear Full Cover with built-in screen can protect the screen and four sides of your watch from Scratch-proof on a common occasion.
Package include: 1* Full Protection Screen Protector Case

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,171 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
